title: S&P 500 Interactive Chart
text:
S&P 500 Performance Since 2000
Here’s an interactive chart showing the S&P 500 index.


Python code will go here in a code block
import pandas as pd import plotly.graph_objs as go


Load data from GitHub
url = ‘https://raw.githubusercontent.com/martingeew/finance_dashboard_demo/main/sp500_20240825.csv’ df = pd.read_csv(url, index_col=0)
def plot_daily(df): fig = go.Figure(go.Scatter( x=df.index, y=df[“close”], mode=“lines”, name=“S&P 500 Close” )) fig.update_layout( title=“Daily S&P 500 Closing Value”, template=“plotly_white” ) return fig
plot_daily(df)
